title: Love is in the air
creator_credit: Paul Clarke and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Using archival footage and contemporary interviews, this fascinating five part series tells of the history of popular music in Australia. Not only did some home-grown stars and songs make it big locally but proved to be just as successful overseas - especially Australian women.
description: Using archival footage and contemporary interviews, this fascinating five part series tells of the history of popular music in Australia. Not only did some home-grown stars and songs make it big locally but proved to be just as successful overseas - especially Australian women.

Not only did some home-grown stars and songs make it big locally but proved to be just as successful overseas - especially Australian women.
